author: pk910
content:
Heya,
I think Ropsten is currently the only testnet where end-users can easily test their staking setup.
Goerli is great too, but for quite many users it's too complicated and time consuming to collect the amount of GoETH to run a validator.
(Or they just buy the required funds, which is definitely not what we encourage to do)
Maybe there should be another short-lived testnet (like kiln) for testing staking setups?
